data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 203,143 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Northern Samar, Philippines
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Northern Samar, Philippines.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Northern Samar, Philippines that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Northern Samar who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Negrito, Mamanwa people.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Northern Samar, Philippines to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Northern Samar.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Northern Samar
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

location.name: Northern Samar
location.people_groups_list: Jama Mapun, Bajau Kagayan, Japanese, Sindhi, Molbog, Sangil
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jama Mapun, Bajau Kagayan (50,000), Japanese (4,500), Sindhi (31,000), Molbog (24,000), Sangil (9,700)
